name: The Last Survivors
description: In a desolate world, you seem to find remnants of a civilization that once was. Find out what happened to them.

puzzles.name: Are You Human?
puzzles.question: /images/captcha.jpeg
puzzles.description: On your explorations, you come across a dilapidated door, with signs of corrosion. The green patina on the exposed wiring did not deter the screen from displaying this image.

puzzles.name: The Unknown Code
puzzles.description: Even though you got in, you wonder what the sign meant. You see a note with this language on it.

puzzles.name: Secrets
puzzles.question: ZBDBMYOKQOJZRJCOGJSIKZSCJHJSBKTDHXJZRY
puzzles.answer: We cannot let them find our digital secrets
puzzles.hint: Stoned wheat in order without V
puzzles.description: The last? What does that mean? You see another note with this language on it. Maybe that would help you understand what the sign meant.

puzzles.name: Password
puzzles.question: Z2l2ZSBtZSBhY2Nlc3M
puzzles.description: You see an ancient computer with a password prompt. You need to find the password to get in. You see a note on the computer with this phrase on it.

puzzles.name: Image
puzzles.question: /images/kiwi.png
puzzles.hint: Is there something hidden in this image?
puzzles.description: You get in! You see a desktop with a file called "kiwi.png". You open it and see this image.
